title: In-Depth Mathematics Concept Course Through Bilingual Interaction

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A customized mathematics course for working professionals, structured in a bilingual environment where learners solve math problems and engage in discussions in both their native language and a foreign language.

learning_goals: Learners can explain mathematical problem-solving processes in their native language and a foreign language with over 80% accuracy in a bilingual environment.
Learners can successfully derive complex mathematical problem-solving strategies three or more times through linguistic negotiation with peers.
Learners can identify and explain five or more connections between mathematical concepts using bilingual interactions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
